Articles.Content:
I am experiencing a crash at launch everytime I launch the game

I don't know if I have too many mods or my GeForce is not powerful enough.

I have 24GB of memory, I souldn't have any RAM issues

 

Crash report : https://pastebin.com/grQTJfUK

 

Thanks in advance

First, is it possible that KSP got updated to 1.3 when you're still using 1.2.2 mods? Steam can and will silently update KSP behind your back, which is why many people (including myself) copy the KSP folder somewhere else, and leave the Steam installation as pure stock.

Second, that's not really much info: please read this:
Thanks for your help. I will have to rollback my installation then.
